Title: Squiggle - A free open source LAN Messenger
Description:
Squiggle is a free server-less peer to peer LAN messenger.
Just download and run it and you're ready to talk to everyone on your LAN.
HomeWiki:
We are now on GitHub!

Please visit https://github.com/hasankhan/Squiggle for downloads, support, and other information.
TagList: lan chat,lan messenger,chatting,messenger,p2p chat,peer to peer chat,Projects,WPF,
